comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: The constructor was Michail Ivanovich Popov (1894-1922) - in Cyrillic Михаил Иванович Попов. During his short life he designed and built several airplanes of which this one is mostly identified as the Popov-1. The engine was a 150 hp Hispano-Suiza. Machine can be dated around 1920-1922, only a single sample built.
